Package it.uninsubria.server.service

Class BookServiceCoreImpl

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.service.BookServiceCoreImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookServiceCore
public class BookServiceCoreImpl extends Object implements BookServiceCore
Core implementation of BookService, handling business logic and caching for book operations.

    • searchGlobally

      public List<Book> searchGlobally() throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: BookServiceCore
      Searches for all books in the catalog (global search).

      Results are cached for performance. Large datasets are loaded in batches with the first batch returned immediately.

      Specified by:
      searchGlobally in interface BookServiceCore
      Returns:
      list of all books in the catalog
      Throws:
      Exception - if search fails due to database or cache errors

    • searchGloballyPaged

      public List<Book> searchGloballyPaged(int offset, int limit) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: BookServiceCore
      Performs paginated global search for books.

      Useful for handling large datasets efficiently by loading results in chunks rather than all at once.

      Specified by:
      searchGloballyPaged in interface BookServiceCore
      Parameters:
      offset - the number of records to skip (for pagination)
      limit - the maximum number of records to return
      Returns:
      paginated list of books
      Throws:
      Exception - if search fails

    • searchGloballyForUser

      public List<Book> searchGloballyForUser(String userId) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: BookServiceCore
      Searches for all books for a specific user (user-specific cache).

      Results are cached separately per user to prevent cache pollution between different users' searches.

      Specified by:
      searchGloballyForUser in interface BookServiceCore
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      list of all books
      Throws:
      Exception - if search fails

    • invalidateBooksCacheForUser

      public void invalidateBooksCacheForUser(String userId) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: BookServiceCore
      Invalidates the book cache for a specific user.

      Only affects the specified user's cache, leaving other users' cached data intact.

      Specified by:
      invalidateBooksCacheForUser in interface BookServiceCore
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose cache should be invalidated
      Throws:
      Exception - if cache invalidation fails
